'''Unfinished Comedy''' is a [[World Quest]] Series in [[Fortress of Meropide]], [[Fontaine]].

This Quest Series is referred to as '''Caterpillar's Story: Prologue''' in the Fontaine [[Reputation]] menu.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The name of this quest series, Unfinished Comedy, is a reference to the 1957 Chinese film {{zh|{{w|The Unfinished Comedy|没有完成的喜剧}}|Méiyǒu wánchéng de xǐjù|The Unfinished Comedy.}}
